fields.summary: Create event page for SPC-Anthropic Agents Hackathon
fields.description: Design and publish an event page for the SPC-Anthropic Agents Hackathon (Apr 11-13). Include registration form, agenda overview, and prize information.

fields.summary: Reach out to potential judges for Agents Hackathon
fields.description: Contact and confirm 5-7 judges for the SPC-Anthropic Agents Hackathon. Judges should have expertise in AI agents, LLMs, or relevant technical backgrounds. Create a spreadsheet to track outreach progress.

fields.summary: Secure Neha Kumar as opening speaker for Agents Hackathon
fields.description: Reach out to Neha Kumar from Anthropic to confirm her as the opening speaker for the SPC-Anthropic Agents Hackathon. Coordinate date/time, presentation details, and any technical requirements.

fields.summary: Coordinate fireside chat with Mike Krieger for Hackathon wrap-up
fields.description: Arrange an off-the-record fireside chat with Mike Krieger, CPO of Anthropic, for April 15th to wrap up the SPC-Anthropic Agents Hackathon. Discuss format, topics, and moderator selection.

fields.summary: Plan catering for Agents Hackathon (3 days)
fields.description: Arrange catering for all three days of the SPC-Anthropic Agents Hackathon. Include breakfast, lunch, dinner, and snacks/beverages. Account for dietary restrictions and ensure sustainable packaging options.

fields.summary: Set up Kisi door management for hackathon weekend
fields.description: Configure Kisi access control system for the hackathon weekend (Apr 11-13). Create temporary access permissions for participants, judges, and speakers. Test the system before the event.

fields.summary: Source and order hackathon prizes
fields.description: Research, select, and order prizes for the SPC-Anthropic Agents Hackathon winners. Categories include Grand Prize, Runner-up, Most Innovative, Best Technical Implementation, and Audience Choice. Budget: $5,000 total.

fields.summary: Hire AV team for hackathon documentation and livestream
fields.description: Contract an AV team to handle photography, video recording, and livestreaming for the SPC-Anthropic Agents Hackathon. Focus on demo day livestream on Sunday afternoon.

fields.summary: Assess projector replacement requirements
fields.description: Evaluate the current projector setup and research replacement options. Document specifications needed, potential models, and installation requirements.

fields.summary: Obtain quotes for cross-beam installation
fields.description: Contact 3+ contractors to obtain quotes for installing a cross-beam in the hall space to support the new projector. Include timeline estimates and any required permits in the quote request.

fields.summary: Schedule space closure for projector installation
fields.description: Plan the temporary closure of the hall space for the cross-beam and projector installation. Coordinate with existing events calendar to minimize disruption.

fields.summary: Communicate space closure to SPC members
fields.description: Draft and send communications to all SPC members about the temporary hall space closure for projector replacement. Include dates, alternative meeting spaces, and the benefits of the upgrade.

fields.summary: Purchase new projector and accessories
fields.description: Order the selected projector model along with necessary cables, mounts, and accessories. Confirm delivery timeline aligns with installation schedule.

fields.summary: Oversee cross-beam and projector installation
fields.description: Coordinate and supervise the contractor's installation of the cross-beam and new projector in the hall space. Ensure proper testing and calibration.

fields.summary: Create documentation for new projector system
fields.description: Develop user guides and troubleshooting documentation for the new projector system. Include instructions for common tasks and contact information for technical support.

fields.summary: Plan February Founder Matching event
fields.description: Organize the February Founder Matching event. Prepare format, schedule, registration process, and facilitation materials.

fields.summary: Coordinate AI/ML Technical Talk for February
fields.description: Secure speaker and organize logistics for the February AI/ML Technical Talk. Topic: 'Advancements in Multimodal LLMs and Their Applications'.

fields.summary: Organize Pitch Practice workshop
fields.description: Plan and execute a Pitch Practice workshop for SPC members. Arrange for experienced founders and investors to provide feedback. Create materials for common pitch mistakes and best practices.

fields.summary: Plan March Deep Dive: Healthcare Tech
fields.description: Organize a deep dive session on Healthcare Tech. Secure industry experts, prepare discussion topics, and create relevant materials for participants.

fields.summary: Coordinate March Investor Networking event
fields.description: Plan and execute an Investor Networking event for SPC members in March. Secure 8-10 investors, create matchmaking process, and prepare the venue.

fields.summary: Plan April Founder Matching event
fields.description: Organize the April Founder Matching event. Iterate on format based on feedback from February's event. Focus on AI and climate tech synergies.

fields.summary: Organize April Technical Talk: Edge Computing
fields.description: Secure speaker and organize logistics for the April Technical Talk on Edge Computing and IoT integrations.

fields.summary: Plan POC Development Workshop for April
fields.description: Organize a workshop focused on developing effective proofs of concept. Include technical best practices, resource planning, and case studies from successful SPC members.

fields.summary: Organize -1 To Vinod Khosla event
fields.description: Plan and execute the -1 To Vinod Khosla fireside chat event on February 11. Coordinate with Khosla Ventures, prepare moderator, venue setup, and member communications.

fields.summary: Coordinate -1 To Forerunner with Kirsten Green
fields.description: Plan and execute the -1 To Forerunner with Kirsten Green event on February 4. Arrange venue, refreshments, moderator, and promotional materials.

fields.summary: Organize -1 To Satya Nadella event
fields.description: Plan and execute the -1 To Satya Nadella fireside chat on March 4. Coordinate with Microsoft team, arrange security, prepare venue, and manage registrations.

fields.summary: Plan Imagined Futures panel event with Neal Stephenson and Ken Liu
fields.description: Organize the 'Imagined Futures' panel discussion with Neal Stephenson, Ken Liu, Cyan Banister, and Joscha Bach on March 26. Coordinate with authors' teams, prepare moderators (Jonathan Brebner & Cristian Cibils Bernardes), and manage event logistics.

fields.summary: Create promotion plan for March-April public events
fields.description: Develop and execute a comprehensive promotion plan for public events in March and April, including social media strategy, email campaigns, and partner cross-promotion opportunities.

fields.summary: Manage Winter 2025 Demo Faire follow-ups
fields.description: Create and implement a follow-up plan for connections made during the January Winter 2025 Demo Faire. Collect feedback from presenters and attendees, and compile metrics for future events.

fields.summary: Create hackathon judging criteria and rubric
fields.description: Develop comprehensive judging criteria and scoring rubric for the SPC-Anthropic Agents Hackathon. Include categories for innovation, technical implementation, business potential, presentation quality, and AI agent capabilities.

fields.summary: Develop hackathon participant guides and resources
fields.description: Create comprehensive guides and resources for hackathon participants, including schedule, rules, access to Anthropic APIs, technical documentation, and FAQ.

fields.summary: Coordinate post-projector installation A/V testing
fields.description: Schedule and conduct thorough testing of the new projector system with various devices, media types, and use cases. Document any issues and arrange for adjustments as needed.

fields.summary: Announce reopening of hall space with improved projector
fields.description: Draft and send communications to all SPC members about the completed projector upgrade and hall space reopening. Include details about new capabilities and instructions for use.

fields.summary: Develop March member newsletter
fields.description: Create and distribute the March newsletter for SPC members. Include updates on recent and upcoming events, member spotlights, and community announcements.

fields.summary: Develop April member newsletter
fields.description: Create and distribute the April newsletter for SPC members. Highlight the SPC-Anthropic Agents Hackathon, upcoming events, and community achievements.

fields.summary: Create hackathon swag and participant packages
fields.description: Design and order branded swag items for hackathon participants. Prepare welcome packages including schedule, badges, swag, and sponsor materials.

fields.summary: Secure WiFi bandwidth boost for hackathon weekend
fields.description: Coordinate with ISP to temporarily increase bandwidth for the hackathon weekend. Ensure network infrastructure can handle increased traffic and API connections.

fields.summary: Finalize hackathon schedule and session locations
fields.description: Complete detailed schedule for the SPC-Anthropic Agents Hackathon, including opening, workshops, mentoring sessions, meals, demos, and closing events. Assign specific locations for each activity.

fields.summary: Create post-hackathon survey for participants
fields.description: Develop a comprehensive feedback survey for hackathon participants to assess satisfaction, gather improvement suggestions, and identify future collaboration opportunities.

fields.summary: Run workshop on climate tech startup trends
fields.description: Organize a workshop focused on current trends and opportunities in climate tech for founders in the exploration phase. Secure subject matter experts and prepare discussion materials.

fields.summary: Coordinate mentorship sessions for February
fields.description: Schedule and manage mentorship sessions between experienced founders/investors and SPC members for February. Ensure diverse representation of industries and expertise.

fields.summary: Coordinate mentorship sessions for March
fields.description: Schedule and manage mentorship sessions between experienced founders/investors and SPC members for March. Focus on AI, healthcare, and fintech expertise.

fields.summary: Coordinate mentorship sessions for April
fields.description: Schedule and manage mentorship sessions between experienced founders/investors and SPC members for April. Include mentors with expertise in hardware, robotics, and climate tech.

fields.summary: Set up hackathon team formation platform
fields.description: Research, select, and configure an online platform for hackathon team formation and project idea sharing. Test with internal users before launch.

fields.summary: Prepare supplementary hackathon materials from Anthropic
fields.description: Coordinate with Anthropic to obtain and organize technical materials, API documentation, sample code, and reference guides for hackathon participants.

fields.summary: Create member feedback system for community events
fields.description: Design and implement a standardized feedback collection system for all community events. Create a dashboard to track satisfaction metrics and improvement suggestions over time.

fields.summary: Update SPC website events calendar for Q2 2025
fields.description: Update the South Park Commons website events calendar with all confirmed Q2 2025 events. Ensure consistent formatting and complete event details.

fields.summary: Coordinate technical staff for Mike Krieger's fireside chat
fields.description: Arrange technical support staff for the off-the-record fireside chat with Mike Krieger on April 15. Ensure audio, lighting, and seating are optimally configured.

fields.summary: Develop summer 2025 community events plan
fields.description: Create a comprehensive plan for SPC community events for summer 2025 (May-August). Include regular recurring events and special programming based on member interests.

fields.summary: Prepare hackathon post-event report for stakeholders
fields.description: Create a comprehensive post-event report for the SPC-Anthropic Agents Hackathon to share with stakeholders. Include participation metrics, project highlights, feedback summary, and recommendations for future collaborations.
